revised_title: Brain Weight in Different Human Races
tldr: The author examines the weight of human brains in different races and finds significant differences in brain weight among various ethnic groups. The study shows that brain weight varies from one race to another, with some races having larger brains than others. The author concludes that previous assumptions about brain size and intelligence may not be accurate across all races.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Anthropology
